PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q "seed.ts"; then echo "REMINDER: You modified seed.ts. You MUST update the Unit costs catalog table in README.md to match. Run npm run check:readme to verify."; fi'
bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q "routes/"; then echo "REMINDER: You modified a route file. If you changed API endpoints, update the API table in README.md."; fi'

Stop.command: bash -c 'if ! bash scripts/check-readme-costs.sh 2>&1; then echo "WARNING: README costs table is out of sync with seed.ts. Please fix before committing."; fi'
